message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $12,000?
Thanks for offering the product, Alice. I'm interested, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $9,000?
I understand that $9,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $11,000?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $10,000?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. How about $11,500?
This is getting close, Alice.  One last offer - $10,500.  If that doesn't work, I'll have to go with a different seller.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $11,500, but I'm willing to meet you halfway on the last offer. How about $11,250?
